article.author: Celebrity Cruises
article.title: The Retreat. All Suites. All Exclusive. All Included.
article.lead: So Much More Than a Suite
article.body: The Retreat includes stunning accommodations, a private restaurant, and an exclusive lounge and sundeck that rival any high-end resort.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ru_wiiW--GU?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Globus
article.title: Globus: Undiscovered Places
article.lead: Follow Globus to off-the-beaten-path locations in Italy, Britain, the Mediterranean & North America with the authentic traditions, charm and cultural treasures that only a local can show you.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1225Fbrq_AE?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Princess Cruises
article.title: Dream with Us | Princess Cruises
article.lead: Princess is using this pause in operations to consult with the best minds in medical science, public health, and infectious disease control. When it’s safe to sail again, they’ll be ready with new health & safety protocols that will give their guests and crew peace of mind. Until then, where are you dreaming of taking your next vacation?
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/GypIOQf7S5g?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
